flounder.engine.implementation

Class IRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.engine.implementation.IRenderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AABBRenderer, FontRenderer, GuiRenderer, ParticleRenderer

    public abstract class IRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a sub renderer in the engine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      IRenderer()
      Creates a new sub renderer in the engine.
